effect_entries.short_effect: Summons Rayquaza to the Embedded Tower.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ホウエン地方の　伝説と
深い　関わりが　あると　いわれる
みどりいろに　かがやく　たま。

A shiny green orb that is said to have
a legend tied to it. It’s known to have a
deep connection with the Hoenn region.

Sfera con riflessi verdi, che pare essere
strettamente legata alle leggende della regione
di Hoenn.

Joya de un solo uso que potencia los
movimientos de tipo Planta. Debe llevarla
un Pokémon.

Eine grün schimmernde Kugel, von der in den
Legenden der Hoenn-Region berichtet wird.

Un orbe viride dont on dit qu’il a un lien très
étroit avec les légendes de Hoenn.

호연지방의 전설과
깊은 연관이 있다고 전해지는
초록색으로 빛나는 구슬.

ホウエンちほうの　でんせつと
ふかい　かかわりが　あると　いわれる
みどりいろに　かがやく　たま。

A shiny green orb that is said to have
a legend and has a deep connection with
the Hoenn region.

A shiny green orb that is said to have
a legend and has a deep connection with
the Hoenn region.

Un orbe viride dont on dit qu’il a un
lien très étroit avec les légendes
de Hoenn.

A shiny green orb that is said to have
a legend and has a deep connection with
the Hoenn region.
